attributes.action: Nigel Farage to be honoured in the New Years honours list.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage to be honoured in the New Year honours list for services to his country. Let’s show how much we appreciate Nigel’s relentless hard work and Refusing to back down to the political elite of Europe.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has done a great service to this country by orchestrating Brexit which was the will of the British people. Yet the establishment would rather honour Nick Clegg a firm advocate of the remainers. Let’s force the government to recognise Nigel’s hard work and commitment to his country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
